title: U.S. Digital Accessibility Apprenticeship Program
summary: Presentation & tutorial on the ne Digital Accessibility Apprenticeship Program, funded, and governed by the U.S. Department of Labor.
goals: Demystify what Apprenticeship means, funding available, how companies can participate.
Present the newly established Digital Accessibility Apprenticeship, developed by Helix Opportunity with the U.S Department of Labor.
